Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 76th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Clark, Halsted and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Clark, Halsted and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

Headline: No trains between Southport and the Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Clark/Lake due to police actvity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Clark/Lake due to police actvity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Southport at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses are available between Southport and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
